TextView.android:text: The Phone comes with a large 3700 mAh battery to support it's 6.41 inch screen with Optic AMOLED display having a resolution of 1080 x 2340 at 402 ppi. The screen is also protected by a durable Scratch Resistant glass. OnePlus 6T boasts of dual primary camera of 16 + 20 megapixel and 16 megapixel front Camera.
